content: 5 inches before total length toe the toe is worked in pattern according to the sole chart cc rds instep k3 work sole chart to 3 k3 repeat on sole include decreases in the 3 k sts if needed decrease round k1 k2tog work to 3 before the end of the instep ssk k1 repeat on sole how to work 1 decrease round on the instep work all sole sts there are 31 35 39 sts on the instep and on the sole 2 work 3 rds in pattern decrease round 2 times 3 work 2 rds in pattern decrease round 3 4 5 times 4 work 1 round in pattern decrease round 5 5 6 times if the last decrease round is done with cc knit it without slipping sts there are 22 26 26 sts left kitchener the toe in the opposite color weave in the ends ready for the second sock sock shoes 2024 imawale designs - all rights reserved 4 cuff chart leg chart leg/instep chart heel flap chart sole chart − v − 2 8 8 v v 8 v 8 cid 2 − 1 v 7 v 7 v v 7 7 4 3 2 1 6 6 6 v v v 6 v 5 v 5 5 v v 5 k k − p − p 4 4 v 4 v 4 v 3 v v 3 v v 3 3 mc cc 2 2 2 v v 2 v 1 cid 1 v 1 1 v v 1 v sl 1 v sl 1 4 3 2 1 5 4 3 2 1 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 4 3 2 1 repeat 8 9 10 times repeat 7 8 9 times back of shoe chart all sizes v v v v v v v v v v 28 c2l c2r 27 v v v v v v v v v v 26 c2l c2r 25 v v v v v v v v v 24 c2l c2r 23 v v v v v v v v v 22 c2l c2r 21 v v v v v v v v 20 v c2l c2r v 19 v v v v v v v v 18 v c2l c2r v 17 v v v v v v v 16 v c2l c2r v 15 v v v v v v v 14 v c2l c2r v 13 v v v v v v 12 v v c2l c2r v v 11 v v v v v v 10 v v c2l c2r v v 9 v v v v v 8 v v c2l c2r v v 7 v v v v v 6 v v c2l c2r v v 5 v v v v 4 v v v c2l c2r v v v 3 v α α α α α α α α α α α v 2 v v v b b b b b b b b b
